original_text: Its vestibule faced the outer court, and palm trees were on its jambs, and its stairway had eight steps.
korean_text: 현관이 바깥뜰로 향하였고 그 문 벽 위에도 종려나무를 새겼으며 그 문간으로 올라가는 여덟 층계가 있더라

sentences.original_text: Its vestibule faced the outer court
and palm trees were on its jambs
and its stairway had eight steps
